column1: I am 16, in marching band, and have autism and ADD. Make me cry.
Last night a guy I know lost his virginity to a prostitute. Roast.
I'm 22, I like art, I'm a soulless ginger, and I have never been roasted.. go on now, Show me what ya got u cheeky cunts
Justin and Juan don't believe you have what it takes to really roast. Prove them wrong.
